name: Green Eyes Angel
overview:
Green Eyes Angel is leading specialist in Mobile Apps Development ( iPhone, iPad, iOS, Android, Blackberry and Windows). We have proven expertise in

Mobile Application Development (iPhone, iOS, iPad, iPad 2 Android, BlackBerry)

  • Expertise in creating Location and GPS Based Apps
  • Photo Manipulation and Social Media Engagements
  • Educational Apps on iPad
  • Push Notifications and In app Purchase based Apps
  • BarCode Scanner based Apps Admob, iAd based Apps InMobi

Offshore Staffing and Staff Augmentation

Service Description Green Eyes Angel Software came in to existence to address the growing concerns in outsourcing and offshoring business. As the industry is growing so are the providers, hence from a customer standpoint it is really difficult to identify a true service provider who does not focus on earning some quick money rather have firm belief in creating value and win win situation.

We have proven ourselves to be a leading player in Mobile Application Development and have hundreds of apps already developed and live on respective market places of iPhone and Android.

Green Eyes Angel is based on these fundamental values of

  • Integrity
  • Passion and Excellence
  • Customer Delight
  • Team Work

We truly believe in creating customer delight rather than just simple customer satisfaction. We put enough time to train our staff on technical and soft skills. We always believe that there are always higher levels to perform and scope to improvements and that is why we are always open for feed backs and areas of improvement. Our technical staff is highly competent in technology and communication and we focus on quality rather than quantity.

Our breadth of technology service includes:

o iPhone and iPad Application Development o Android Application Development o Blackberry Application Development

We have implemented optimum quality processes and have derived the best practices from Agile, CMM and ISO to ensure on time delivery with high quality ensuring customer delight. Our code review and testing processes ensure high quality code and nearly bug free software.

Eager to serve you. Green Eyes Angel Team

iPhone Programming OS 3.0 +,
Objective C Google Android Programming Advanced Java Advanced PHP AJAX ASP.Net using C# Drupal5 LAMP MySQL PHP5
